summary: mac80211: fix deadlock in AP/VLAN handling
details:
mac80211: fix deadlock in AP/VLAN handling

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.12.13 by commit 8043903fcb72f545c52e3ec74d6fd82ef79ce7c5, it was introduced in version v5.12 by commit a05829a7222e9d10c416dd2dbbf3929fe6646b89. For more details please see the references link.
